dictionary.title: Excipient_Thickener
dictionary.desc: Dictionary consisting of 1 term plus 13 related synonyms. Some entries may also include the term's: source, description, wikidataID, chebiID, chebiName, FDAcode

dictionary.contributor: Peter Murray-Rust: Reader Emeritus in Molecular Informatics, Unilever Centre, Dept. Of Chemistry University of Cambridge
